trans-unit.source: Both *args and **kwargs are necessary because the optimizer from fit must call this function and only supports passing arguments via *args (for example scipy.optimize.fmin_l_bfgs).
trans-unit.target: * args和** kwargs都是必需的，因为来自 fit 的优化器必须调用此函数，并且仅支持通过* args传递参数（例如 scipy.optimize.fmin_l_bfgs ）。

trans-unit.source: Both frequency and variance weights are verified for all basic results with nonrobust or heteroscedasticity robust cov_type. Other robust covariance types have not yet been verified, and at least the small sample correction is currently not based on the correct total frequency count.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有基本结果，均使用非稳健或异方差稳健 cov_type 验证了频率和方差权重。其他健壮的协方差类型尚未得到验证，并且至少小样本校正当前不基于正确的总频率计数。

trans-unit.source: Both the AR and MA components must include the coefficient on the zero-lag. In almost all cases these values should be 1. Further, due to using the lag-polynomial representation, the AR parameters should have the opposite sign of what one would write in the ARMA representation. See the examples below.
trans-unit.target: AR和MA组件都必须包括零滞后的系数。几乎在所有情况下,这些值都应该是1。此外,由于使用滞后多项式表示法,AR参数的符号应该与ARMA表示法中的写法相反。请看下面的例子。

trans-unit.source: By default, each variable with missing variables is modeled using a linear regression with main effects for all other variables in the data set. Note that even when the imputation model is linear, the PMM procedure preserves the domain of each variable. Thus, for example, if all observed values for a given variable are positive, all imputed values for the variable will always be positive. The user also has the option to specify which model is used to produce imputed values for each variable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,每个有缺失变量的变量都会使用线性回归建模,并对数据集中的所有其他变量产生主效应。需要注意的是,即使推算模型是线性的,PMM程序也会保留每个变量的域。因此,例如,如果一个给定变量的所有观测值都是正值,那么该变量的所有推算值将始终为正值。用户还可以选择指定哪个模型用于产生每个变量的推算值。

trans-unit.source: By default, numpy arrays are row (C)-ordered and most time series are represented in the long format (with time on the 0-th axis). In this case, no copying or re-ordering needs to be performed, instead the array can simply be transposed to get it in the right order and shape.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,numpy数组是按行(C)排序的,大多数时间序列都是以长格式来表示的(时间在0-th轴上)。在这种情况下,不需要进行复制或重新排序,而只需要简单地对数组进行转置就可以得到正确的顺序和形状。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Kalman filter computes a number of intermediate matrices at each iteration. The memory conservation options control which of those matrices are stored.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,卡尔曼滤波器在每次迭代时都会计算一些中间矩阵。内存保护选项控制这些矩阵中哪些被存储。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Kalman filter follows Durbin and Koopman, 2012, in initializing the filter with predicted values. Kim and Nelson, 1999, instead initialize the filter with filtered values, which is essentially just a different timing convention.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,卡尔曼滤波器遵循Durbin和Koopman,2012,用预测值初始化滤波器。而Kim和Nelson,1999,则用滤波值初始化滤波器,本质上只是一种不同的时间约定。

trans-unit.source: Calculate recursive ols with residuals and cusum test statistic. This is currently mainly helper function for recursive residual based tests. However, since it uses recursive updating and doesn’t estimate separate problems it should be also quite efficient as expanding OLS function.

trans-unit.source: Calculates P(Y_1,Y_2,...Y_n | X_1,X_2...X_m) = P(X_1, X_2,...X_n, Y_1, Y_2,..., Y_m)/P(X_1, X_2,..., X_m). The conditional density is by definition the ratio of the two densities, see [1].
trans-unit.target: 计算 P(Y_1,Y_2,...Y_n | X_1,X_2...X_m) = P(X_1, X_2,...X_n, Y_1, Y_2,..., Y_m)/P(X_1, X_2,..., X_m) 。根据定义，条件密度是两个密度之比，请参见[1]。

trans-unit.source: Calculates power discrepancy, a class of goodness-of-fit tests as a measure of discrepancy between observed and expected data.
trans-unit.target: 计算功率差异,这是一类拟合度测试,用于衡量观测数据和预期数据之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Calculates sandwich covariance matrix for a single cluster, i.e. grouped variables.
trans-unit.target: 计算单个聚类,即分组变量的三明治协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the Hessian matrix for the linear mixed effects model with respect to the parameterization in which the covariance matrix is represented directly (without square-root transformation).
trans-unit.target: 计算线性混合效应模型相对于参数化的黑森矩阵,在参数化中,协方差矩阵直接表示(没有平方根变换)。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the Jarque-Bera test for normality

Calculates the conditional mean E[y|X] where y = g(X) + e. Note that the “local constant” type of regression provided here is also known as Nadaraya-Watson kernel regression; “local linear” is an extension of that which suffers less from bias issues at the edge of the support.
trans-unit.target: 计算条件平均 E[y|X] ，其中 y = g(X) + e 。请注意，此处提供的“局部常数”回归类型也称为Nadaraya-Watson核回归。“局部线性”是该扩展的扩展，该扩展受支撑边缘的偏差问题的影响较小。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the condtional mean E[y|X] where y = g(X) + e, where y is left-censored. Left censored variable Y is defined as Y = min {Y', L} where L is the value at which Y is censored and Y' is the true value of the variable.
trans-unit.target: 计算条件均值 E[y|X] ，其中 y = g(X) + e ，其中y是左删减的。左删变量Y定义为 Y = min {Y', L} 其中 L 是所述值 Y 被审查和 Y' 为变量的真值。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the cross-validation least-squares function. This function is minimized by compute_bw to calculate the optimal value of bw.
trans-unit.target: 计算交叉验证最小二乘函数。该函数由compute_bw最小化以计算 bw 的最佳值。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the cross-validation least-squares function. This function is minimized by compute_bw to calculate the optimal value of bw
trans-unit.target: 计算交叉验证最小二乘函数。该函数由compute_bw最小化,以计算bw的最佳值。

trans-unit.target: 假设数据为正态分布,计算Kim和White中稳健峰度量的期望值。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the score vector with respect to the parameterization in which the random effects covariance matrix is represented through its Cholesky square root.

trans-unit.source: Chapter 3.4 describes ARMA and ARIMA models in state space form (using the Harvey representation), and gives references for basic seasonal models and models with a multiplicative form (for example the airline model). It also shows a state space model for a full ARIMA process (this is what is done here if simple_differencing=False).
trans-unit.target: 第3.4章以状态空间形式（使用Harvey表示）描述了ARMA和ARIMA模型，并提供了基本的季节性模型和具有乘法形式的模型（例如航空公司模型）的参考。它还显示了完整ARIMA流程的状态空间模型（如果 simple_differencing=False ,则在此处完成此操作）。

trans-unit.source: Chapter 3.6 describes estimating regression effects via the Kalman filter (this is performed if mle_regression is False), regression with time-varying coefficients, and regression with ARMA errors (recall from above that if regression effects are present, the model estimated by this class is regression with SARIMA errors).
trans-unit.target: 第3.6章介绍了通过Kalman滤波器（如果 mle_regression 为False时执行），具有时变系数的回归和具有ARMA错误的回归（从上方回忆，如果存在回归效应，则由此类估算的模型）来估计回归效应。具有SARIMA错误的回归）。

trans-unit.source: Chapter 8.4 describes the application of an ARMA model to an example dataset. A replication of this section is available in an example IPython notebook in the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 第8.4章描述了ARMA模型在一个示例数据集上的应用。本节的复制品可以在文档中的IPython笔记本示例中找到。

trans-unit.source: Checks if det(I - Az) = 0 for any mod(z) <= 1, so all the eigenvalues of the companion matrix must lie outside the unit circle
trans-unit.target: 检查是否对任何mod（z）<= 1的det（I-Az）= 0，因此伴随矩阵的所有特征值必须位于单位圆之外

trans-unit.source: Chisquare test statistic is exactly (<1e-13) the same result as bptest in R-stats with defaults (studentize=True).
trans-unit.target: 卡方检验统计量与R-stats中具有默认值（studentize = True）的bptest的结果完全相同（<1e-13）。

trans-unit.source: Choice of lag order can be a difficult problem. Standard analysis employs likelihood test or information criteria-based order selection. We have implemented the latter, accessible through the VAR class:
trans-unit.target: 滞后顺序的选择可能是一个难题。标准分析采用可能性测试或基于信息准则的订单选择。我们已经实现了后者，可以通过 VAR 类进行访问：

trans-unit.source: Cholesky decomposition is about twice as fast as LU decomposition, but it requires that the matrix be positive definite. While this should generally be true, it may not be in every case.
trans-unit.target: Cholesky分解的速度大约是LU分解的两倍,但它要求矩阵是正定的。虽然这一点一般来说应该是正确的,但并不是在所有情况下都是如此。

trans-unit.source: Class in stats.outliers_influence, most standard measures for outliers and influence are available as methods or attributes given a fitted OLS model. This is mainly written for OLS, some but not all measures are also valid for other models. Some of these statistics can be calculated from an OLS results instance, others require that an OLS is estimated for each left out variable.
trans-unit.target: stats.outliers_influence中的类,给定一个拟合的OLS模型,大多数标准的离群值和影响力的度量都可以作为方法或属性。这主要是为OLS而写的,有些但不是所有的度量也对其他模型有效。其中一些统计量可以从OLS结果实例中计算出来,其他的统计量则需要为每个遗漏变量估计一个OLS。

trans-unit.source: Combinations of these are possible (e.g. "cili" or "colo" for linear trend with intercept). When using a constant term you have to choose whether you want to restrict it to the cointegration relation (i.e. "ci") or leave it unrestricted (i.e. "co"). Don’t use both "ci" and "co". The same applies for "li" and "lo" when using a linear term. See the Notes-section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 这些的组合是可能的（例如，带有截距的线性趋势的 "cili" 或 "colo" ）。使用常数项时，必须选择是将其限制为协整关系（即 "ci" ）还是使其不受限制（即 "co" ）。不要同时使用 "ci" 和 "co" 。当使用线性项时， "li" 和 "lo" 也是如此。有关更多信息，请参见注释部分。

trans-unit.source: Currently, GMM takes arbitrary non-linear moment conditions and calculates the estimates either for a given weighting matrix or iteratively by alternating between estimating the optimal weighting matrix and estimating the parameters. Implementing models with different moment conditions is done by subclassing GMM. In the minimal implementation only the moment conditions, momcond have to be defined.
trans-unit.target: 当前，GMM采用任意非线性矩条件，并通过给定最佳加权矩阵和估计参数之间交替来计算给定加权矩阵的估计值或迭代计算。通过将GMM子类化，可以实现具有不同力矩条件的模型。在最小的实现中， momcond 定义即时条件momcond。

trans-unit.source: Denton’s method minimizes the distance given by the penalty function, in a least squares sense, between the unknown benchmarked series and the indicator series subject to the condition that the sum of the benchmarked series is equal to the benchmark. The modification allows that the first value not be pre-determined as is the case with Denton’s original method. If the there is no benchmark provided for the last few indicator observations, then extrapolation is performed using the last benchmark-indicator ratio of the previous period.
trans-unit.target: Denton的方法在最小二乘意义上最小化了未知基准基准序列和指标序列之间的惩罚函数给定的距离，前提是基准序列之和等于基准。修改允许不像Denton的原始方法那样预先确定第一个值。如果没有为最后的几个指标观察提供基准，则使用上一期间的最后一个基准指标比率进行推断。

Empirical CDF as a step function.

Empirical likelihood is a method of nonparametric inference and estimation that lifts the obligation of having to specify a family of underlying distributions. Moreover, empirical likelihood methods do not require re-sampling but still uniquely determine confidence regions whose shape mirrors the shape of the data. In essence, empirical likelihood attempts to combine the benefits of parametric and nonparametric methods while limiting their shortcomings. The main difficulties of empirical likelihood is the computationally intensive methods required to conduct inference. statsmodels.emplike attempts to provide a user-friendly interface that allows the end user to effectively conduct empirical likelihood analysis without having to concern themselves with the computational burdens.
trans-unit.target: 经验似然性是一种非参数推理和估计的方法，它消除了必须指定一组基础分布的义务。而且，经验似然方法不需要重新采样，但仍然唯一地确定其形状反映数据形状的置信区域。本质上，经验似然尝试将参数方法和非参数方法的优点结合起来，同时限制它们的缺点。经验似然的主要困难是进行推理所需的计算量大的方法。 statsmodels.emplike 试图提供一个用户友好的界面，该界面允许最终用户有效地进行经验似然分析，而不必担心计算负担。

trans-unit.source: F:varname : create dummy variables for factor varname

Factor models generally try to find a small number of unobserved "factors" that influence a subtantial portion of the variation in a larger number of observed variables, and they are related to dimension-reduction techniques such as principal components analysis. Dynamic factor models explicitly model the transition dynamics of the unobserved factors, and so are often applied to time-series data.
trans-unit.target: 因子模型通常试图找到少量的未观察到的 "因素",这些因素影响着大量观察到的变量变化中的微小部分,它们与主成分分析等维度还原技术有关。动态因子模型明确地模拟了未观察到的因子的过渡动态,因此经常被应用于时间序列数据。

trans-unit.source: Filtering assumes a priori that business cycles exist. Due to this assumption, many macroeconomic models seek to create models that match the shape of impulse response functions rather than replicating properties of filtered series. See VAR notebook.
trans-unit.target: 过滤假设存在业务周期的先验条件。由于这个假设，许多宏观经济模型寻求创建与脉冲响应函数的形状相匹配的模型，而不是复制滤波后的序列的属性。请参阅VAR笔记本。

trans-unit.source: Filtering is done with scipy.signal.convolve, so it will be reasonably fast for medium sized data. For large data fft convolution would be faster.
trans-unit.target: 滤波是用scipy.signal.convolve完成的,所以对于中等规模的数据来说,它的速度会相当快。对于大数据,fft卷积会更快。
